NAVIGATION WRAPPER

Full navigation layout with Sidenav, Header and Content

*NOTE: Page requires navigation-wrapper with sidenav and content-area for proper layout
*NOTE: App Information contains: sidenav-user which is User Name, sidenav-location which can contain store location or user's department, and Store number below
*NOTE: When using header in conjunction with sidenav, remove content within header-info div. Also add with-header to content-area div. 
<div class="navigation-wrapper">
    <div class="sidenav scrollable">

                <i class="icon_homedepot"></i>
            </div>
            <label class="sidenav-user">Firstname Lastname</label>
            <label class="sidenav-location">Store Location | Department</label>
            <a class="fab" href="#">Store<span>0000</span></a>
        </div>

            <li><a href="#"><i class="icon_nav_hd_online"></i>HD.com</a>

        </ul>
    </div>
